MakeMe

Moduleembedthis.me
Definition class MakeMe
InheritanceMakeMe Object

MakeMe Class This implements the MakeMe 'me' tool and provides constant definitions.

Inherited Methods

Method Detail

programFiles32(): Path
Description
The MakeMe location on windows under Program Files. Will be either /Program Files for 32-bit, or /Program Files (x86) for 64-bit.
strace(tag: String, args: Array)
Description
Emit "show" trace. This is trace that is displayed if me --show is invoked.
Parameters
tag: String Informational tag emitted before the message.
args: Array Message args to display.
trace(tag: String, args: Array): Void
Description
Emit trace.
Parameters
tag: String Informational tag emitted before the message.
args: Array Message args to display.
vtrace(tag, args: Array)
Description
Emit "verbose" trace. This is trace that is displayed if me --verbose is invoked.
Parameters
tag Informational tag emitted before the message.
args: Array Message args to display.
